about.title: About Us
about.story1: Three friends, three paths that time has brought together again. After years of travels, learning and shared dreams, we found ourselves in Seville with a clear idea: to create a place that reflected our essence.
about.story2: Thus Adagio was born, a space where Andalusian tradition meets creativity. Here, tapas are our language, good wine our celebration and design a reflection of our character: authentic, dynamic and always in motion.
about.story3: In the vibrant heart of Andalusia, we invite you to discover a new gastronomic rhythm. Welcome to Adagio and Bon Appétit.
